com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std

Class StdEvaluationContextFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.eval.EvaluationContextFactory
      • com.att.research.xacmlatt.pdp.std.StdEvaluationContextFactory

  • public class StdEvaluationContextFactory
extends EvaluationContextFactory
    StdEvaluationContextFactory extends EvaluationContextFactory to implement the getEvaluationContext method with a standard EvaluationContext.
    Version:
    $Revision: 1.1 $
    Author:
    car
